title: Drawing, Sujets et Liste des Objets de Dessert [List of Subjects for the Service on the Theme of Desserts]; verso:  Plate Design Sketch, 1819–20
title_raw: Sujets et Liste des Objets de Dessert [List of Subjects for the Service on the Theme of Desserts]; verso:  Plate Design Sketch
medium: Pen and brown ink, red crayon on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink,upper center:  Sujets et.Liste des objets de dessert/par ordre; in pen and brown ink [unless stated otherwise], down left side of sheet:  1er cahier [underlined]/1[slashed in red crayon] les vins, champagne/2 [slashed in red pencil] le sucre [underlined in blue ink]/3 [slashed in red crayon] les pèches, abricots [peaches, apricots]/4 [slashed in red crayon] les poires [underlined in graphite] [pears]/5 [slashed in red crayon] les pommes [underlined in graphite]/6 [slashed in red crayon] les raisins [grapes]/7 [slashed in red crayon] noix[walnuts] x/8 [slashed in red crayon] les noisettes[hazelnuts] x/9 [slashed in red crayon] les [word crossed out] groseilles [red currents]/10 [slashed in red crayon] les Cerises[Cherries]/—1er cahier terminé/en Nov. 1823/; in lower left:  x non payées [underlined in red crayon]; down middle of sheet: 2e cahier [underlined]/1[slashed in brown ink and in red pencil] les fraises [strawberries]; in graphite: 1[slashed in red crayonl] P. 11/ 2 [slashed in brown ink and red crayon] annanas [underlined in graphite] P 12/3 [slashed in red crayon] oranges [underlined in pen and blue ink] P 13/ 4 [slashed in brown ink and red crayon] marons [underlined in pen and blue ink]; in red crayon: P 16/ in pen and blue ink:  X; 5 [slashed in red crayon] pruneaux [underlined in pen and blue ink]; in red crayon:  P 15/ 6 compotes et marmelades/7 crèmes/8 fromages salés [underlined in graphite/9 confitures en pot/10 flans (poires &)—3e cahier [underlined]/1 [slashed in red crayon] les pièces montès [underlined in graphite]; in red crayon:  16/2 [slashed in red crayon] les macarons; in red crayon:  17/3 les biscuits (encaisse a la cuillère/4 ;les petits gateaux [underlined in pen and blue ink/5 les drayées/ 6 le punch/7; in pen and blue ink:  x; les fruits a l'eau de vie [underlined in pen and blue ink/8 les liqueurs...[unreadable] a glace [underlined]/9 les sorbets [underlined in graphite]/ 10 le cafe [underlined in graphite]; verso:  inscribed in graphite, upper right corner:  1° Les animaux [?] en leur utilités [underlined]/2° Les ...[underlined]/le/ Les bois [?]/Les.../ Les ..../Les rais [raisins?]/Les pommes/le mocha[?]
description: List, in three columns, of subjects for designs on the theme of different desserts.  Verso:  design of plate with a central roundel of two roughly sketched figures and a rim decorated with seven empty roundels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Sujets et Liste des Objets de Dessert [List of Subjects for the Service on the Theme of Desserts]; verso:  Plate Design Sketch, 1819–20. Pen and brown ink, red crayon on cream laid paper. 
1989-13-32
